segments.text: I see the girl standing next to the boy, waiting for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks so excited, her hand is outstretched and ready.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she knows how dangerous it is for the boy to be up there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool he's standing on looks like it's about to tip over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She seems to be encouraging him, not caring about the risk.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the cookie jar is almost full, it must be really tempting for them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is holding a plate, probably to catch the cookies he's taking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think they are both going to get into trouble if they're not careful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cabinets are open, and the boy is stretching as high as he can.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they don't make too much of a mess while trying to get those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR
